backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a chess backend with game management, player stats, and user profiles, all protected by role-based access control via an AccessControl mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features and their associated test IDs, primarily documenting fixes to AI move triggering, stale closure issues, and auto-play alternation in ChessGame.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON map of frontend source file paths to short descriptions summarizing the purpose and key changes of each file in the chess application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the ChessGame page directly with no additional routing or layout.
frontend/src/components/ChessBoard.tsx: Chess board renderer that maps an 8x8 board array to ChessSquare components, supporting dual prop names for selection and game-over state, plus AI thinking and last-move overlays.
frontend/src/components/ChessSquare.tsx: Individual chess square component rendering piece glyphs, valid-move indicators, coordinate labels, check highlights, and a last-move highlight overlay.
frontend/src/components/GameModeSelector: Button group component for selecting among four game modes (Two Players, vs AI, Auto Play, Online), highlighting the active mode in gold.
frontend/src/components/GameResultsPanel: A modal dialog component that displays the game outcome (win, draw, stalemate) along with points earned, and provides New Game and Close buttons.
frontend/src/components/GameStatus.tsx: Displays the current game status bar showing whose turn it is, check warnings, AI thinking indicator, optional chess clocks, and a mute toggle button.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Renders a scrollable leaderboard panel showing the top 20 players sorted by points, with wins and games played counts fetched via useLeaderboard hook.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing loading state and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
UI for creating or joining an online multiplayer game by generating/sharing a game ID, requiring authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/PlayerIdentity.t: Displays the authenticated user's display name (or truncated principal) in a small badge, hidden when not logged in.
frontend/src/components/PlayerStats.tsx: Shows the current player's points and wins fetched via usePlayerStats hook in a compact inline badge.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users without a profile to enter a display name, saving it to the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating dependent queries whenever the identity or actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: React hook that generates and controls looping ambient background music using the Web Audio API, with a C major pentatonic melody scheduler and mute/unmute support.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the currently authenticated user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, logout, and identity state to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaderboard.ts: React Query hook that fetches the global leaderboard (list of principals and player stats) from the backend, refreshing every 60 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoveSound.ts: React hook that synthesizes a short percussive chess-piece move sound using the Web Audio API with layered oscillators and a noise burst.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineGame.ts: React Query/Mutation hook managing online game state, including polling the backend for game updates and providing mutations to create or join a game.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlayerStats.ts: React Query hook that fetches stats for the currently authenticated player from the backend, polling every 30 seconds.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining chess-themed CSS design tokens, Tailwind base/component/utility layers, and custom animations for the chess UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/ChessGame.tsx: Main chess game page component managing local, AI, auto-play, and online game modes, including game state, timers, AI moves, sound, and UI panels like leaderboard and results.
frontend/src/pages/OnlineChessGame.tsx: React component for an online chess game that syncs backend game state to a local board, handles player moves with optimistic UI updates, and detects game-over conditions like checkmate, stalemate, and threefold repetition.
frontend/src/types/chess.ts: Defines core TypeScript types for the chess application including Board, Piece, Player, GameState, Position, and related enums like GameMode and DrawReason.
frontend/src/utils/ai-player.ts: Implements a chess AI using minimax with alpha-beta pruning, including material values and positional bonus tables for each piece type to evaluate and select the best move.
frontend/src/utils/backend-sync.ts: Provides conversion utilities between the frontend's Unicode chess piece representation and the backend's structured Piece objects, supporting both directions of transformation.
frontend/src/utils/chess-setup.ts: Creates the initial chess board layout with Unicode pieces and exports helper functions to identify piece color (white/black) from Unicode symbols.
frontend/src/utils/game-status.ts: Determines the current game status (playing, check, checkmate, stalemate, or draw) for a given board and player by checking legal moves and king safety.
frontend/src/utils/move-validation.ts: Contains move validation logic for all chess piece types (pawn, rook, bishop, queen, king, knight) and a general isValidMove function that enforces movement rules and prevents capturing own pieces.
frontend/src/utils/position-tracker.ts: Tracks board positions using a serialized string key to detect threefold repetition, with utilities to record positions, check repetition counts, and reset history.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with optional sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/utils/valid-moves.ts: Provides utility functions to compute valid moves for a chess piece or all pieces for a player, filtering out moves that would leave the king in check, and checking if any valid moves exist.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the theme with chess-specific colors, custom fonts (Playfair Display, EB Garamond), shadows, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 19) including implemented features, architectural notes, and known issues such as broken checkmate detection and AI not making moves in single-player/auto-play modes.
